description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bring the sophistication of a fine wall clock to your home with ease! Features 12 varied clock designs. Beautiful wall clocks, funky natural clocks, and quirky one-of-a-kind timepieces! There’s a clock for everyone. The digital alarm is great for taking a nap after playing some games. It’s time to check out Clock 24-7! v1.02
